local_intent: Locate red plate, set place pose, move above and align, lower until contact, place white plate, open gripper, verify release, retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already grasped and stable in gripper
Red plate is within reachable workspace
Setting 'red_plate_pose' on the blackboard is acceptable for PlaceAt
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'transfer' phase of the global plan: locates red plate, sets placement pose, moves above, aligns, lowers to contact, places with a press, releases, verifies release, and retreats.
